Script.name: Loginhandler
Script.script: function Loginhandler() sendGMCP( [[Core.Supports.Debug 20 ]]) -- sendGMCP( [[Core.Supports.Set [ "MG.char 1" ] ]]) sendGMCP( [[Core.Supports.Remove [ "Char 1" ] ]]) -- Wie kriegt man gmod dazu, wenn man nicht weiss, auf welchen User der Char registriert hat? gmod.registerUser("MG-Package") gmod.enableModule("MG-Package", "MG.char") gmod.enableModule("MG-Package", "MG.room") mainWidth, mainHeight = getMainWindowSize() createGauge("healthbar",150,20,mainWidth-380, mainHeight-40, nil, 0, 255, 50) createGauge("manabar",150, 20,mainWidth-380, mainHeight-20, nil, 0, 50, 200) end

Script.script: -- function setPoisonStatus() -- if gmcp.MG.char.vitals.poison == 0 then -- setBackgroundColor("healthbar", 0, 255, 50, 255) -- else -- setBackgroundColor("healthbar", 255, 0, 0, 255) -- end --end function setPoisonStatus() val = gmcp.MG.char.vitals.poison if val == 0 then r = 0 g = 255 b = 50 else -- Farbuebergang gelb->orange->rot r = 255 g = 255-val*25 b = 0 end setBackgroundColor("healthbar", r, g, b, 255) end
